languages.text: "Мы лишились Кьявы Гамма и это стало поистине чудовищным ударом для каждого члена семьи Гапрак. Я сама потеряла веру в будущее, мои близкие также ощутили утрату своего предназначения. Нам требовалось время, чтобы восстановиться и понять, как быть дальше — мы были и остаемся в состоянии сделать это самостоятельно. Но я не буду лукавить — другие семейства предлагали нам свою небескорыстную помощь. Возможно, Гален за моей спиной решил воспользоваться чьим-то предложением".

traits.locale_text: "Мы лишились Кьява-Гамма и это стало поистине чудовищным ударом для каждого члена семьи Гапрак. Я сама потеряла веру в будущее, мои близкие также ощутили утрату своего предназначения. Нам требовалось время, чтобы восстановиться и понять, как быть дальше — мы были и остаемся в состоянии сделать это самостоятельно. Но я не буду лукавить — другие семейства предлагали нам свою не бескорыстную помощь. Возможно, Гален за моей спиной решил воспользоваться чьим-то предложением".
traits.speaker: ToriannaGaprak

languages.text: "We lost Kiava Gamma — a truly devastating blow to every member of House Gaprak. I lost all hope for the future, and my kin lost their sense of purpose. We needed time to recover and chart a new course for ourselves. We were and still are more than capable of doing that. But I will not deny it — the other houses have offered us their assistance... for their own self-serving ends. Perhaps Halen decided to take them up on one of their offers behind my back."
languages.original_text: "Мы лишились Кьявы Гамма и это стало поистине чудовищным ударом для каждого члена семьи Гапрак. Я сама потеряла веру в будущее, мои близкие также ощутили утрату своего предназначения. Нам требовалось время, чтобы восстановиться и понять, как быть дальше — мы были и остаемся в состоянии сделать это самостоятельно. Но я не буду лукавить — другие семейства предлагали нам свою небескорыстную помощь. Возможно, Гален за моей спиной решил воспользоваться чьим-то предложением".

traits.locale_text: "We had lost Kiava Gamma — a truly horrible blow to every family member of the House Gaprak. I had lost all sense of hope for the future, and my relatives also lost their sense of purpose. We needed time to recover and chart a new course for ourselves — we still are more than capable of doing that. But I will not lie — the other Houses had offered us their selfish help. Perhaps Halen decided to take up on one of the offers behind my back."
traits.speaker: ToriannaGaprak

traits.locale_text: "We had lost Kiava Gamma — a truly horrible blow to every family member of the House Gaprak. I had lost all sense of hope for the future, and my relatives also lost their sense of purpose. We needed time to recover and chart a new course for ourselves — we still are more than capable of doing that. But I will not lie — the other Houses had offered us their selfish help. Perhaps Halen decided to take up on one of the offers behind my back."
traits.speaker: ToriannaGaprak

traits.locale_text: "We lost Kiava Gamma, a truly horrible blow to every member of House Gaprak. I have abandoned hope for the future and my kin have lost their sense of purpose too. We needed time to recover and chart a new course for ourselves. We were and still are more than capable of doing that. But let's be honest, the other Houses offered us their self-seeking help. Perhaps Halen decided to take up on one of the offers behind my back."
traits.speaker: ToriannaGaprak

traits.locale_text: "We lost Kiava Gamma, a truly horrible blow to every member of House Gaprak. I have abandoned hope for the future and my kin have lost their sense of purpose too. We needed time to recover and chart a new course for ourselves. We were and still are more than capable of doing that. But let's be honest, the other Houses offered us their self-seeking help. Perhaps Halen decided to take up on one of the offers behind my back."

We needed time to recover and chart a new course for ourselves. We were and still are more than capable of doing that. But I will not deny it — the other houses have offered us their assistance... for their own self-serving ends. Perhaps Halen decided to take them up on one of their offers behind my back."
traits.speaker: ToriannaGaprak

traits.locale_text: "We lost Kiava Gamma — a truly devastating blow to every member of House Gaprak. I lost all hope for the future, and my kin lost their sense of purpose. We needed time to recover and chart a new course for ourselves. We were and still are more than capable of doing that. But I will not deny it — the other houses have offered us their assistance... for their own self-serving ends. Perhaps Halen decided to take them up on one of their offers behind my back."
traits.speaker: ToriannaGaprak

languages.text: 「キアヴァ・ガンマを失ったことは、ギャプラック家全員にとって実に壊滅的な痛手でした。私は将来への希望を失い、キンは目的意識も失いました。私たちが立ち直り、新たな進路を自ら決めるには時間が必要でした。以前も、今も能力以上のことをなそうとしているのです。しかし、正直に言うと…他家が利己的な目的のために援助を申し出てきたのです。恐らく、ヘイレンは私に隠れてそうした援助話のひとつに乗ることを決めたのでしょう」
languages.original_text: "We lost Kiava Gamma — a truly devastating blow to every member of House Gaprak. I lost all hope for the future, and my kin lost their sense of purpose. We needed time to recover and chart a new course for ourselves. We were and still are more than capable of doing that. But I will not deny it — the other houses have offered us their assistance... for their own self-serving ends. Perhaps Halen decided to take them up on one of their offers behind my back."

traits.locale_text: 「キアヴァ・ガンマを失ったことは、ギャプラック家全員にとって実に大きな痛手でした。私には将来の希望などありませんし、同胞は目的意識も失いました。私たちが立ち直り、新たな進路を自ら決めるには時間が必要でした。以前も、今も能力以上のことをなそうとしているのです。しかし、正直に申し上げますと、他家が身勝手な援助を申し出てきたのです。恐らく、ヘイレンは私に隠れてそうした援助話のひとつに乗ることを決めたのでしょう」
traits.speaker: ToriannaGaprak

languages.text: “我们失去了基亚瓦伽马星，这对于贾帕克家族的每个人来说都是毁灭性的打击。我失去了对未来的一切希望，许多族人也失去了奋斗的目标。我们需要一段时间来休养生息，规划新的道路。无论是过去还是现在，贾帕克家族都有能力做到这一点。但这一点我不否认——确实有其他家族……出于不为人知的目的，向我们抛出了橄榄枝。或许哈伦背着我，接受了某个家族的援助。”
languages.original_text: "We lost Kiava Gamma — a truly devastating blow to every member of House Gaprak. I lost all hope for the future, and my kin lost their sense of purpose. We needed time to recover and chart a new course for ourselves. We were and still are more than capable of doing that. But I will not deny it — the other houses have offered us their assistance... for their own self-serving ends. Perhaps Halen decided to take them up on one of their offers behind my back."

traits.locale_text: “我们失去了基亚瓦伽马星，这对于贾帕克家族的每个人来说都是毁灭性的打击。我失去了对未来的希望，许多族人也失去了奋斗的目标。我们需要一段时间来休养生息，规划新的道路。无论是过去还是现在，贾帕克家族都有能力做到这一点。但说实话，也有其他家族处于某种不为人知的目的，向我们抛出了橄榄枝。或许哈伦背着我，接受了某个家族的援助。”
traits.speaker: ToriannaGaprak

languages.text: « Après la perte de Kiava Gamma, le désespoir s'est emparé des membres de ma maison, et j'ai moi-même perdu tout espoir en l'avenir. Nous avions besoin de temps pour redonner un sens à notre existence, pour nous redéfinir. Je savais que nous en étions capables. Je ne nierai pas que d'autres maisons nous ont proposé leur aide, mais soyons honnêtes : aucune offre n'était totalement désintéressée. Halen a peut-être décidé d'accepter l'une d'elles sans m'en informer... »
languages.original_text: "We lost Kiava Gamma — a truly devastating blow to every member of House Gaprak. I lost all hope for the future, and my kin lost their sense of purpose. We needed time to recover and chart a new course for ourselves. We were and still are more than capable of doing that. But I will not deny it — the other houses have offered us their assistance... for their own self-serving ends. Perhaps Halen decided to take them up on one of their offers behind my back."

traits.locale_text: « Après la perte de Kiava Gamma, le désespoir s'est emparé des membres de ma maison, et j'ai moi-même perdu tout espoir en l'avenir. Nous avions besoin de temps pour redonner un sens à notre existence, pour nous redéfinir. Je savais que nous en étions capables. Les autres maisons nous ont proposé leur aide, mais soyons honnêtes : aucune offre n'était totalement désintéressée. Halen a peut-être décidé d'accepter l'une d'elles sans m'en informer... »
traits.speaker: ToriannaGaprak

languages.text: «Habíamos perdido Kiava Gamma, un duro golpe para cada uno de los miembros de la casa Gaprak. Yo había perdido toda esperanza en el futuro y los míos habían perdido su propósito. Necesitábamos tiempo para recuperarnos y volver a encaminar nuestras vidas. Éramos y seguimos siendo más que capaces de hacerlo. Las otras casas nos ofrecieron ayuda... en su propio beneficio. Quizás Halen decidiera aceptar alguna de sus ofertas a mis espaldas».
languages.original_text: "We lost Kiava Gamma — a truly devastating blow to every member of House Gaprak. I lost all hope for the future, and my kin lost their sense of purpose. We needed time to recover and chart a new course for ourselves. We were and still are more than capable of doing that. But I will not deny it — the other houses have offered us their assistance... for their own self-serving ends. Perhaps Halen decided to take them up on one of their offers behind my back."

traits.locale_text: «Perdimos Kiava Gamma, un duro golpe para cada uno de los miembros de la casa Gaprak. Ya no tengo esperanza en el futuro y los míos han perdido el rumbo. Necesitábamos tiempo para recuperarnos y volver a encaminar nuestras vidas. Éramos y seguimos siendo más que capaces de hacerlo. Las otras casas nos ofrecieron ayuda de manera egoísta. Quizás Halen decidiera aceptar alguna de sus ofertas a mis espaldas».
traits.speaker: ToriannaGaprak

languages.text: "Wir haben Kiava Gamma verloren, ein verheerender Schlag für alle Mitglieder des Hauses Gaprak. Ich habe jede Hoffnung für die Zukunft aufgegeben, und auch meine Verwandten haben ihren Sinn im Leben verloren. Es wird dauern, bis wir uns erholen und einen neuen Weg für unsere Familie finden können. Aber es wird uns gelingen. Aber ich leugne es nicht, die anderen Häuser haben uns ihre Hilfe angeboten ... aus Eigennutz. Vielleicht hat Halen entschieden, hinter meinem Rücken eines dieser Angebote anzunehmen."
languages.original_text: "We lost Kiava Gamma — a truly devastating blow to every member of House Gaprak. I lost all hope for the future, and my kin lost their sense of purpose. We needed time to recover and chart a new course for ourselves. We were and still are more than capable of doing that. But I will not deny it — the other houses have offered us their assistance... for their own self-serving ends. Perhaps Halen decided to take them up on one of their offers behind my back."

traits.locale_text: "Wir haben Kiava Gamma verloren, ein schrecklicher Schlag für alle Mitglieder des Hauses Gaprak. Ich habe die Hoffnung für die Zukunft aufgegeben, und auch meine Verwandten haben ihren Sinn im Leben verloren. Es wird dauern, bis wir uns erholen und einen neuen Weg für unsere Familie finden können. Aber es wird uns gelingen. Es muss aber gesagt werden, dass die anderen Häuser uns aus egoistischen Motiven Hilfe angeboten haben. Vielleicht hat Halen entschieden, hinter meinem Rücken eines dieser Angebote anzunehmen."
traits.speaker: ToriannaGaprak

languages.text: "Kiava Gama'yı kaybettik. Bu, Gaprak Hanesi mensupları için feci oldu. Şahsen gelecekten ümidimi kesmiştim, akrabalarım da hayatlarında bir amaç gütmüyordu artık. Kalkınıp kendimize yeni bir çizgi çizebilmek için vakit gerekiyordu. Bunu başaracak hâldeydik, hâlâ da öyleyiz. Ancak diğer hanelerin bize... Kendi çıkarları için sundukları yardım tekliflerini de inkâr etmeyeceğim. Belki Halen, benden habersiz bu tekliflerden birini kabul etmiştir."
languages.original_text: "We lost Kiava Gamma — a truly devastating blow to every member of House Gaprak. I lost all hope for the future, and my kin lost their sense of purpose. We needed time to recover and chart a new course for ourselves. We were and still are more than capable of doing that. But I will not deny it — the other houses have offered us their assistance... for their own self-serving ends. Perhaps Halen decided to take them up on one of their offers behind my back."

traits.locale_text: "Kiava Gama'yı kaybettik. Gaprak Hanesi mensupları için feci bir durumdu bu. Şahsen gelecekten ümidimi kesmiştim, akrabalarım da hayatlarında bir amaç gütmüyordu artık. Kalkınıp kendimize yeni bir çizgi çizebilmek için vakit gerekiyordu. Bunu başaracak hâldeydik, hâlâ da öyleyiz. Ancak diğer hanelerin bize... kendi çıkarları için sundukları yardım tekliflerini de inkâr etmeyeceğim. Belki Halen, benden habersiz bu tekliflerden birini kabul etmiştir."
traits.speaker: ToriannaGaprak
